thread.title: Is Aamir Khan planning a sequel to his Oscar-nominated film 'Lagaan'?
thread.title_full: Is Aamir Khan planning a sequel to his Oscar-nominated film 'Lagaan'? - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Is Aamir Khan planning a sequel to his Oscar-nominated film 'Lagaan'?
text: The industry grapevine is abuzz with rumours about Aamir Khan contemplating taking forward the story of his 2001 epic sports drama, 'Lagaan' with a new director and actress on board. The Ashutosh Gowariker-directed film had not only proved to be the biggest blockbuster of that year and received critical acclaim at film festivals, ... Â»
